backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a tic-tac-toe backend with game state logic, including win/tie detection, symbol counting, and a `updateGameState` function that returns a `Features` record with points and game field info.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three video playback features (play/pause button, fullscreen mode, timer overlay toggle) to their implementing source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose and key implementation details for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes, including background, foreground, card, sidebar, chart, and destructive color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the TickTaskTime app, loading the Quicksand font from Google Fonts and mounting the React app via `/src/main.tsx`.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component that composes all timer modes, background/music providers, fullscreen video overlay logic, timer visibility/tab ordering, sound customization, and an error boundary into a single routed layout.
frontend/src/branding.ts: Single-export module providing the app name constant `APP_NAME = 'TickTaskTime'` as the branding source of truth.
frontend/src/features/alerts/alertSounds: Defines available alert sound options and provides a `playAlertSound` utility that plays built-in synthesized sounds (beep, chime, bell) via Web Audio API or custom sounds (including YouTube URLs) safely without throwing errors.
frontend/src/features/alerts/TimerAlertS: Settings card component for timer alerts, allowing users to enable/disable completion alerts, select a built-in or custom completion sound, and preview the selected sound.
frontend/src/features/alerts/TimerAlerts: React context provider that manages timer alert settings (enabled state, completion sound selection) with localStorage persistence, and exposes functions to notify completion with toast + sound and preview sounds.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/Backgr: UI component with tabs for setting a custom background via file upload, direct URL, or YouTube URL, plus controls for brightness, volume, and timer overlay toggle.
A fixed floating play/pause button rendered only when a video or YouTube background is active and not in fullscreen, toggling playback on click.
React context provider wrapping the `useBackground` hook, exposing background state and actions to children while automatically revoking stale blob URLs on background changes.
Renders the active background (image, video, or YouTube) as a full-screen layer, handling play/pause control, error states, spacebar keyboard shortcut, and brightness overlay.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/loadYo: Loads the YouTube IFrame Player API script once and returns a shared promise that resolves when the API is ready. Also declares global TypeScript types for the YT player interface.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/mediaS: Provides utility functions for inferring media type from MIME types or URLs, validating URLs, probing whether a URL loads as an image or video, and generating user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/useBac: Custom React hook that manages background state (image, video, or YouTube) with localStorage persistence, boot-time validation of persisted backgrounds, and controls for brightness, volume, and playback.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/YouTub: Memoized component that initializes and manages a YouTube IFrame API player sized to cover the viewport, supporting play/pause control, volume adjustment, looping, and error reporting.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/youtub: Parses various YouTube URL formats to extract a video ID and builds optimized YouTube embed URLs with autoplay and loop parameters for background playback.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicProvide: React context provider that exposes the useMusic hook's state and actions (source URL, type, volume, controls) to the component tree via MusicContext.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicSetting: UI component for configuring music playback, allowing users to input a Spotify, Apple Music, or direct audio URL and adjust volume via a slider.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicStage.t: Renders the appropriate audio output element—a hidden HTML audio element for direct audio, or off-screen iframes for Spotify and Apple Music embeds—and manages audio playback lifecycle.
frontend/src/features/music/musicSupport: Parses music URLs to classify them as Spotify, Apple Music, direct audio, or unknown, and converts share links into embeddable URLs for each supported service.
frontend/src/features/music/useMusic.ts: Custom React hook that manages music playback state (source URL, type, embed URL, volume) with localStorage persistence and an audio element ref for direct audio control.
frontend/src/features/navigation/Navigat: Settings UI component that displays instructions for drag-to-reorder navigation tabs and provides a button to reset the tab order to default.
frontend/src/features/navigation/navigat: Defines the NavigationTabId type, tab definitions, default order array, and a helper to get a tab's label by ID.
frontend/src/features/navigation/Reorder: Navigation tab bar component that supports pointer-based drag-and-drop reordering via a grip handle, updating tab order on drop.
frontend/src/features/navigation/useNavi: Custom hook that loads, persists, and normalizes the navigation tab order from localStorage, with a reset function to restore the default order.
frontend/src/features/publishShare/Publi: Sheet component that displays the current URL for sharing, with copy-to-clipboard and open-in-new-tab actions, and a warning when running inside an embedded preview iframe.
frontend/src/features/publishShare/useIs: Hook that detects whether the app is running inside an iframe by comparing window.self to window.top, returning a boolean.
frontend/src/features/reminders/Reminder: Headless component that polls reminders every 10 seconds and triggers a notification via the alerts system when a reminder's due date has passed.
UI component for managing reminders, providing dialogs to add and edit reminders with a title and datetime, and displaying them sorted by due date with delete and edit actions.
frontend/src/features/reminders/useRemin: Custom hook that manages a list of reminders in localStorage, exposing add, update, and delete operations with UUID-like ID generation.
frontend/src/features/sounds/CustomSound: React context provider that manages custom sounds state, persisting to localStorage and exposing methods to add (via URL or file upload), update, remove, reorder, and preview sounds.
frontend/src/features/sounds/customSound: Utility module for persisting custom sounds to localStorage with size/count validation, and helpers for generating IDs, converting files to data URLs, and validating audio file types.
frontend/src/features/sounds/SoundCustom: UI panel component for managing custom sounds, supporting add/edit/delete via URL or file upload, drag-and-drop reordering, and preview playback.
frontend/src/features/sounds/useSoundPan: Custom hook that persists and toggles the sound panel's visibility state in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/sounds/youtubeSoun: Module that plays audio from YouTube URLs using the IFrame API in a hidden player, with auto-stop after a configurable duration and cleanup utilities.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/C: Countdown timer card component with editable hours/minutes/seconds duration inputs, play/pause/reset controls, and completion alert integration.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/u: Custom hook managing countdown timer state (duration, time left, running status) with accurate interval ticking, pause/resume support, localStorage persistence, and an onComplete callback.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/In: React component rendering an interval timer card with work/rest display, play/pause/reset/skip controls, and configurable settings for interval durations and rounds.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/us: Custom hook managing interval timer state (work/rest intervals, rounds, countdown) with localStorage persistence, accurate tick logic, and start/pause/reset/skip controls.
frontend/src/features/timers/navigation/: React component providing drag-and-drop reorderable timer navigation tabs using pointer events, with visual offset animations during dragging.
Defines the list of available timer modes with their IDs and labels, the default tab order, and a helper to look up a mode's label by ID.
Small settings UI component that displays instructions for reordering timer tabs and provides a button to reset the tab order to default.
Custom hook that loads, persists, and normalizes the timer tab order from localStorage, with deduplication and missing-mode backfill logic.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/Po: React component rendering a Pomodoro timer card with segment display, play/pause/reset/skip controls, and configurable work, short break, and long break durations.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/us: Custom hook managing Pomodoro timer state including work/break segments, completed pomodoro count, settings persistence in localStorage, and accurate countdown with skip logic.
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/R: React component rendering a repeating timer card with play/pause/reset controls, a time display, completed repeat count, and settings for duration and repeat count (including infinite mode).
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/u: Custom hook managing repeating timer state (countdown, repeat cycles, infinite mode) with localStorage persistence, accurate interval ticking, and start/pause/reset controls.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Anim: SVG component rendering two animated concentric arc rings representing seconds (outer) and minutes (inner) progress, with tick marks and a moving dot indicator.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Edit: Controlled numeric text input component that syncs with an external value, clamps input on blur, and supports keyboard confirmation/cancellation.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Minu: Composite input component that splits a total-seconds value into separate minutes and seconds EditableNumberInput fields and recombines them on change.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Rota: Draggable rotary dial component that maps pointer/touch drag angle to a numeric value within a min/max range, displaying the current value with a rotating indicator dot.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/time: Utility functions to format a total-seconds value as HH:MM:SS or MM:SS, and milliseconds as a similar string with centisecond precision.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/useA: Custom hook that sets up a setInterval with a stable callback ref, running only when the `running` flag is true and cleaning up on stop or unmount.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/S: React component rendering a stopwatch UI card with start/pause, reset, and lap recording controls, displaying elapsed time and a scrollable lap history.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/u: Custom hook managing stopwatch state (elapsed time, running status, laps) with start, pause, reset, and lap recording actions using an accurate interval.
frontend/src/features/timers/visibility/: Fixed bottom bar component showing a wall clock and toggle controls for timer visibility, music, alerts, settings, and sharing.
Fixed top-left clock display that shows the current time and hides itself when an active background (image, video, or YouTube) is set.
Custom hook managing timer and toggle visibility state with localStorage/sessionStorage persistence and auto-hide behavior when a background is active.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file configuring Tailwind base/components/utilities, defining light and dark theme CSS custom properties (OKLCH color tokens), and utility classes for drag animations.
frontend/src/lib/safeStorage.ts: Utility module wrapping localStorage and sessionStorage with error handling and an in-memory fallback for restricted environments like iframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom color tokens using oklch CSS variables, typography, border radius, box shadow, and accordion animations. Includes the tailwindcss-animate and @tailwindcss/typography plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the current state of the TickTaskTime project, including existing features (play/pause, fullscreen playback, timer overlay toggle) and pending action requests for a video player interface.
